text: @SkyNews My daughters a nurse on the front line with type 2 diabetes and u fucking arseholes dont think the public are to blame her life is on the line every day with her illness, trying to help u morons and u cant follow one simple order stay inside. Fucking idiots the lot of u #COVID19
